    • Uses of Command in by.epamtr.totalizator.command.impl

      Classes in by.epamtr.totalizator.command.impl that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChangeLanguageCommand
      Class is designed for localization.
      class  CloseGameCouponCommand
      This class is designed to process close game coupon request.
      class  DeleteEventCommand
      This class is designed to process delete event request.
      class  EditEventCommand
      Class is designed to edit event's info.
      class  EditGameCouponCommand
      Class is designed to edit game coupon's info.
      class  EventCreationCommand
      Class is designed to create a new event.
      class  EventGameMatchingCommand
      Class is designed to process request for matching event and particular game coupon.
      class  GameCreationCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for creating new game coupon.
      class  GoToAdminPageCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding user to the administrators page.
      class  GoToBetSubmitCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding user to the page where he can submit his bet and enter a credit card number.
      class  GoToEditSearchEventCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can select a game coupon (except closed and cancelled ones) and search for it's events.
      class  GoToErrorPageCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding user to the error page.
      class  GoToEventCreationCommand
      Class is designed to process request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can create new events.
      class  GoToEventEditCommand
      Class is designed to process request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can view all info about event and edit it.
      class  GoToGameCouponDetailsCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can view the game coupons's info in details and edit it.
      class  GoToGameCreationCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can create new game coupons.
      class  GoToRegistrationCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding user to the registration page.
      class  GoToSearchEventCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for forwarding administrator to the page where he can select a game coupon (only in the In developing status) and search for it's events.
      class  MakeBetCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for making a bet.
      class  RegistrationUserCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for registration new user with role "user".
      class  SearchAllGameEventsCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for searching events that are matched to the particular game coupon.
      class  SearchMatchingEventsCommand
      Class is designed to process a request for searching for all events that could be matched to the particular game coupon.
      class  ShowEventsCommand
      Class is designed to show user all events available for betting.
      class  SignInCommand
      Class is designed to authenticate a user and create a session for him.
      class  SignOutCommand
      This class is designed to log out a user and destroy his session object.
      class  UnknownCommand
      This class is designed to handle an unknown command.
      class  UnmatchEventCommand
      This class is designed to process a request for unmatching event and game coupon.
